title: Bug 124777: Setting blank tooltip in chart title causes exception during preview
description: When previewing a chart and setting a blank tooltip in the chart title, an unexpected exception occurs.
OB: During chart preview, moving the mouse over the chart title triggers an unexpected exception dialog.
EB: During chart preview, moving the mouse over the chart title should not result in any action or exception. The behavior should be that nothing happens.
SR:
1. Open the chart in the viewer.
2. Set a blank tooltip for the chart title.
3. Preview the chart.
4. Move the mouse over the chart title and observe the unexpected exception dialog.
